price: Kandi ntabwo abenshi mu bantu (babangikanya Imana) baba abemeramana kabone n’ubwo washyiraho umuhate.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
